attributes.action: Ban any form of Sharia Law operating in Great Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
Having lived in several countries we have had to honour their rules and the same should be reciprocated in this country.
British males are allowed one wife that is the law. Under Sharie law they can have as many as they want. Two levels of law can not be allowed in a democratic country.
attributes.background:
The beheading,stoning,burning,honour killing and lashing of people is unacceptable. 
Why should a female who has been raped by a male or males have to die because their religion says it is the females fault in all cases.

rejection.details:
The Government has explained in the past that Sharia 'law' has no jurisdiction in England and Wales and the Government has no intention to change this position. We are not therefore sure what you would like to change.

You can find out more here: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/archived/petitions/48352
